text: Caeau Bronydd-mawr is a Site of Special Scientific Interest in Brecknock, Powys, Wales. It is a fen meadow, notable for its contrasting neutral and acid grassland areas. The site is under private ownership. ==References== ==See also== *List of Sites of Special Scientific Interest in Brecknock Category:Sites of Special Scientific Interest in Brecknock
title: Caeau Bronydd-mawr
